LanguageData.Marksman.degreeDatas.0.label: 神射手
LanguageData.Marksman.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME has displayed a natural affinity for ranged weapons and abhors close quarters combat.
LanguageData.Reaver.degreeDatas.0.label: 掠夺者
LanguageData.Reaver.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME has displayed a natural affinity for melee weapons and abhors ranged.
LanguageData.Efficient.degreeDatas.0.label: 熟练工
LanguageData.Efficient.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME is a highly efficient worker, resulting in increased productivity.
LanguageData.Slacker.degreeDatas.0.label: 懒鬼
LanguageData.Slacker.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME is a slacker and spends as little time as possible working.
LanguageData.Focused.degreeDatas.0.label: 专注
LanguageData.Focused.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME is focused and gets things done slightly faster.
LanguageData.Forgetful.degreeDatas.0.label: 健忘
LanguageData.Forgetful.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME is forgetful and gets things done slightly slower.
LanguageData.Dumb.degreeDatas.0.label: 哑巴
LanguageData.Dumb.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME isn't the sharpest tool in the shed, but that hasn't stopped HIM from getting this far.
LanguageData.ChaoticGenius.degreeDatas.0.label: 怪才
LanguageData.ChaoticGenius.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME is unbelievably smart, however HE is also extremely unstable
LanguageData.Ignorant.degreeDatas.0.label: 愚昧
LanguageData.Ignorant.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME is not a fan of knowledge and is stubborn. A truly unfortunate situation.
LanguageData.DIY.degreeDatas.0.label: DIY狂人
LanguageData.DIY.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME enjoys working with HIS hands and building things.
LanguageData.Strong.degreeDatas.0.label: 强壮
LanguageData.Weak.degreeDatas.0.label: 柔弱
LanguageData.Religious.degreeDatas.0.label: 虔诚
LanguageData.Religious.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME has found faith and peace of mind in HIS religion and is more prepared for what may come than others.
LanguageData.Fanatic.degreeDatas.0.label: 狂热者
LanguageData.Fanatic.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME has found religon and is prepared to do what ever is required to make others accept its truth.
LanguageData.Cultist.degreeDatas.0.label: 迷信
LanguageData.Cultist.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME has heard the call constantly since HE was young. HECAP has followed it across the galaxy, worshipping the soothing sound until HE finally found its source. However on the planet that houses HIS god the call is intermitant, and only occasionally can HE hear its soothing song.
LanguageData.Naive.degreeDatas.0.label: 幼稚
LanguageData.Naive.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME is a generally happy and likable person, but death bothers HIM more than others.
LanguageData.Numb.degreeDatas.0.label: 无动于衷
LanguageData.Numb.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME is emotionally numb and as such is very non-expressive about most things.
LanguageData.Hardened.degreeDatas.0.label: 强硬
LanguageData.Hardened.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME has become accustomed to the harsh reality of death and the horrible things that sometimes need to be done. This has made HIM more mentally stable.
LanguageData.Tough.degreeDatas.0.label: 艰苦
LanguageData.Paranoid.degreeDatas.0.label: 偏执狂
LanguageData.Paranoid.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME believes that everyone is out to get HIM and for the first time in HIS life, HE seems to be right.
LanguageData.Confident.degreeDatas.0.label: 自信
LanguageData.Confident.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME is fairly confident that everything is going to be alright.
LanguageData.Pragmatist.degreeDatas.0.label: 实用主义
LanguageData.Pragmatist.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME is practical, and will cross any line if it serves HIM best. HE isn't bothered by limiting moral choices, after all, HE is just looking out for number 1.
LanguageData.Fat.degreeDatas.0.label: 胖
LanguageData.Fat.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME hates exercise, and despite the fact that HE eats as much as a normal person, HIS sedentary lifestyle has made HIM exceptionally fat.
LanguageData.Fit.degreeDatas.0.label: 健康
LanguageData.Fit.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME loves exercise, and HIS time spent conditioning HIS body has paid off.
LanguageData.Fast.degreeDatas.0.label: 快速
LanguageData.Slow.degreeDatas.0.label: 缓慢
LanguageData.LazyEye.degreeDatas.0.label: 慵懒
LanguageData.LazyEye.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME has a rather unfortunate disability for being on a RimWorld. HECAP has a lazy-eye, making hitting anything much harder
LanguageData.Personality.degreeDatas.0.label: 巧舌如簧
LanguageData.Personality.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME likes to talk and hates to fight, fortunately for HIM, HE's good at talking HIS way out of almost anything.
LanguageData.Personality.degreeDatas.1.label: 善于交流
LanguageData.Personality.degreeDatas.1.description: NAME has been a leader since the first time HECAP made a friend, people are drawn to HIM naturally.
LanguageData.Introvert.degreeDatas.0.label: 害羞
LanguageData.Extrovert.degreeDatas.0.label: 外向
LanguageData.Leader.degreeDatas.0.label: 天生领袖
LanguageData.Villian.degreeDatas.0.label: 恶棍
LanguageData.Villian.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME is the villian of this story.
LanguageData.AnimalLover.degreeDatas.0.label: 动物爱好者
LanguageData.AnimalLover.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME has a passion for animals. HECAP has spent as much time with HIS pets as possible.
LanguageData.Allergic.degreeDatas.0.label: 过敏
LanguageData.Allergic.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME has never liked animals, which isn't helped by the endless sneezing fits HE goes into when in close proximity to one.
LanguageData.Photophobia.degreeDatas.0.label: 避光
LanguageData.Photophobia.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME has an aversion to light, prefering the safety of the dark.
LanguageData.Agoraphobia.degreeDatas.0.label: 旷野恐惧症
LanguageData.Agoraphobia.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME has a fear of open spaces, while HE can manage relatively fine in them, HE is much more comfortable indoors.
